summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1946, for the improvement of North and East Fifty-seventh Street, from Latona Avenue to Kenwood Place; North and East Sixtieth Street, from Latona Avenue to Corliss Avenue; North and East Sixty-second Street, from Latona Avenue to Corliss Avenue; North and East Sixty-fourth Street, from Latona Avenue to Corliss Avenue; First Avenue Northeast, from East Fifty-sixth Street to East Sixty-fifth Street by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 20121, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
